timeStamp.name: Timestamp
timeStamp.description: Date when the entry was submitted

mutations.name: Mutations
mutations.description: Does the API support GraphQL mutation?

subscriptions.name: Subscriptions
subscriptions.description: Does the API support GraphQL subscriptions?

api.name: API
api.description: Does the system provide a REST or HTTP API?

create.name: Create
create.description: Can elements be created via REST?

read.name: Read
read.description: Can elements be read via REST?

update.name: Update
update.description: Can elements be updated via REST?

delete.name: Delete
delete.description: Can elements be deleted via REST?

upload.name: Upload
upload.description: Can uploads be performed via REST?

feature_searchWithinUploads.name: Feature: Search within Uploads
feature_searchWithinUploads.description: Is it possible to search within uploaded documents (PDF, Doc)?

focalPointSupport.name: Focalpoint Support
focalPointSupport.description: Can a focal point be set to images in order to apply smart cropping?

faceDetection.name: Facedetection
faceDetection.description: Can faces in images be detected and added to the metadata of the images?

optimziedImageEncoding.name: Optimized Image Encoding
optimziedImageEncoding.description: Is it possible to optimize images (e.g. WebP, Progressive JPEG)?

assetFingerprinting.name: Asset Fingerprinting
assetFingerprinting.description: Can fingerprints of assets (image, video, audio) be generated in order to find similar assets?

cdnSupport.name: CDN Support
cdnSupport.description: Can Assets be distributed to a CDN in order to speed-up content delivery?

antivirusScanning.name: Antivirus Scanning
antivirusScanning.description: Can uploads be scanned via an antivirus system?

customBinaryHandler.name: Custom Binary Handler
customBinaryHandler.description: Is it possible to hook into the upload process to directly process uploaded assets (e.g. re-encode videos, shrink large images)?

clustering.name: Clustering
clustering.description: Can the system be setup in a cluster (e.g. HA)? - On Premise only

dockerSupport.name: Docker Support
dockerSupport.description: Can the system be run via docker? - On Premise only

importExport.name: Import/Export
importExport.description: Can the whole system or parts be exported and later imported?

cli.name: CLI
cli.description: Is there a CLI which can be used to interact with the System from the console?

bulkImport.name: Bulk Import
bulkImport.description: Is there a feature for bulk imports?

clientSideForms.name: Client Side Forms
clientSideForms.description: Is it possible to manage forms with the System? (e.g. Add a poll to a website and store the data  in the CMS)

pluginSystem.name: Plugin System
pluginSystem.description: Can the system be extended via custom plugins?

customizableUI.name: Customizable UI
customizableUI.description: Can the UI be customized? (e.g. by adding custom form elements)

userManagement.name: Plugin System
userManagement.description: Does the system provide a way to manage users?

documentLevelPermissions.name: Document Level Permissions
documentLevelPermissions.description: Can individual documents have dedicated permissions?

oauth2Support.name: OAuth 2.0 Support
oauth2Support.description: Is it possible to connect to an OAuth 2.0 provider to authenticate users?

auditing.name: Auditing
auditing.description: Will actions be logged? Is it possible to see what changes have been made by whom?

apiKeys.name: API Keys
apiKeys.description: Can keys be used to authenticate the access to the API?

projectSupport.name: Project Support
projectSupport.description: Is it possible to have multiple projects/spaces which dedicated contents?

contentTrees.name: Content Trees
contentTrees.description: Can contents be structured in a tree? Can folders be used?

tagging.name: Tagging
tagging.description: Is it possible to tag contents or other elements in the system?

contentRelations.name: Content Relations
contentRelations.description: How can individual contents be linked to each other?

nestingOfFields.name: Nesting of Fields
nestingOfFields.description: Is it possible to nest a field within a different field in order to create complex field types? (e.g. vcard type which consists of name field and address field)

gdprStatement.name: GDPR Statement
gdprStatement.description: Was an official statement regarding GDPR compliance provided? (Cloud Only)

gdprApi.name: GDPR API
gdprApi.description: Is it possible to quickly find and anonymize stored contents which contain user specific information (e.g. Name, Address, Date of Birth) using a dedicated API?

editingConflictDetection.name: Editing Conflict Detection
editingConflictDetection.description: Will conflicts for concurrent updates / edits be detected?

scheduling.name: Scheduling
scheduling.description: Is it possible to publish a specific content on a specific date?

branches.name: Branches
branches.description: Can contents be branched in order to e.g. refactor the content structure for a relaunch of the connected website?

modelsSchemas.name: Models / Schemas
modelsSchemas.description: Does the System provide a strict content schema?

modelsSchemasVersioning.name: Models / Schemas Versioning
modelsSchemasVersioning.description: Are the content models versioned? Can older versions be accessed?

migration.name: Migration
migration.description: Is it possible to automatically migrate contents if the underlying schema changes? (e.g. Change field type from number to string)

workflows.name: Workflows
workflows.description: Does the system support editing workflows?
